channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Troubled startup CaaStle is now facing two new lawsuits and more allegations

item.title: Meta says its Llama AI models have been downloaded 1.2B times
item.description: In mid-March, Meta said that its “open” AI model family, Llama, hit 1 billion downloads, up from 650 million downloads as of early December 2024. On T...

item.title: 12 Best Delivery Chocolate Boxes to Send and Receive (2025)
item.description: We tasted dozens of chocolate boxes to find the best, from pure chocolate ecstasy to bundles of fun.

item.title: Amazon’s first 27 internet satellites launch to space

item.title: HelloFresh Meal Kit Review (2025): Modern and Tasty, With Caveats
item.description: One of the oldest and biggest meal kits often feels the brightest and most modern. Little missteps hold some recipes back.

item.title: Tesla board member Joe Gebbia actually bought some stock

item.title: States and Startups Are Suing the US Nuclear Regulatory Commission

item.title: WhatsApp Is Walking a Tightrope Between AI Features and Privacy

item.title: Meta previews an API for its Llama AI models

item.title: Millions of Apple Airplay-Enabled Devices Can Be Hacked via Wi-Fi
